register.reg_condition: when AArch32 is supported and FEAT_PMUv3 is implemented

purpose_text.para: Holds the value of the processor Cycle Counter, CCNT, that counts processor clock cycles. See for more information.
PMCCFILTR determines the modes and states in which the PMCCNTR can increment.

configuration_text.para: PMCCNTR is a 64-bit register that can also be accessed as a 32-bit value. If it is accessed as a 32-bit register, accesses read and write bits [31:0] and do not modify bits [63:32].

All counters are subject to any changes in clock frequency, including clock stopping caused by the WFI and WFE instructions. This means that it is CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE whether or not PMCCNTR continues to increment when clocks are stopped by WFI and WFE instructions.

field_description.para: Cycle count. Depending on the values of PMCR.{LC,D}, this field increments in one of the following ways:
Writing 1 to PMCR.C sets this field to 0.

access_permission_text.para: PMCCNTR reads-as-zero and ignores writes if all of the following are true:
PMCCNTR ignores writes if all of the following are true:

ps.name: MRC
MCR
